reg_info.full_title: O. Reg. 92/93: SMALL CLAIMS COURT JURISDICTION
reg_info.act_under: Courts of Justice Act   Loi sur les tribunaux judiciaires

content.content: 1. (1) The maximum amount of a claim in the Small Claims Court is $6,000. (2) The maximum amount of a claim over which a deputy judge may preside is $6,000. O. Reg. 92/93, s. 1. (3)
content.raw_html:
1. (1) The maximum amount of a claim in the Small Claims Court is $6,000.

(2) The maximum amount of a claim over which a deputy judge may preside is $6,000. O. Reg. 92/93, s. 1.

(3)
